# Painless Death (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One willing living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 56

The touched creature dies painlessly and instantly.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1, Sorcerer 1, Wizard 1 to Level
